title: Josep Borrell - Wikipedia
snippet: On 15 May 2024, Borrell called on Israel to immediately halt its assault on Rafah, stating it was disrupting humanitarian aid and causing a humanitarian crisis, while also calling on Hamas to release all Israeli hostages. Borrell condemned the Tel al-Sultan attack, saying that Israel's military actions needed to stop. In May 2025, after his retirement as an EU diplomat, Borrell spoke out against Israel's actions, accusing Israel of committing genocide in Gaza.

title: Josep Borrell begins his term as President of CIDOB | CIDOB
snippet: CIDOB Apr 02 2025 · Following his appointment by the institution’s Board on 13 December, the former head of European diplomacy has begun his agenda as President of CIDOB, a leading think tank in international relations based in Barcelona. title: EEAS: High Representative Josep Borrell announces senior nominations | EEAS
snippet: Josep Borrell, High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy/Vice-President of the European Commission also announces the nomination of two Heads of Delegation of the European Union.

title: Josep Borrell
snippet: Josep Borrell is Senior Distinguished Fellow at the Elcano Royal Institute, and president of CIDOB (Barcelona Centre for International Affairs).

title: Borrell’s U.S. Broadside Reveals the EU Elite’s Post-National Turn
snippet: — December 12, 2025 · Josep Borrell’s latest outburst as former High Representative—accusing the United States of wanting “a white Europe divided into nations”—has triggered a political shockwave that reveals far more than he intended.
